kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL is exactly `url`.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.msg: Location should have been 'http://172.16.2.38:15081/index.html' but was 'http://172.16.2.38:15081/login/index.html'

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL is exactly `url`.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.
kw.msg: Page title is '黑卡审核系统'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by `locator` as current frame.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Typing text '后台' into text field 'id=oText'

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Location Should Be

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.
